content: --लोम {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} ‘against the hair or grain’, contrary to the natural order, inverted, reverse (<ab>opp.</ab> अनुलोम). {2} contrary to easte (said of the issue of a woman who is of a higher caste than her husband). {3} hostile. {4} low, vile, base. {5} left (वाम). {6} obstinate, perverse; अपरिचितस्वापि तेऽप्रतिलोमः संवृत्तः <ls>Ś. 7.</ls> {7} disagreeable, unpleasant. (--मं any injurious or unpleasant act. (--मं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} ‘against the hair or grain’, inversely, invertedly.
